## Data components


<a id="data-component-001"></a>
### User Management

ID: `data-component:001`

- Description: Handles user registration, authentication, and profile management.
- Data entities: data-entity:001

<a id="data-component-002"></a>
### Bus Management

ID: `data-component:002`

- Description: Manages bus information, assignments, and status updates.
- Data entities: data-entity:002

## Data entities


<a id="data-entity-001"></a>
### User

ID: `data-entity:001`

- Description: Represents a user of the Public Transportation Information System.
- Attributes: User ID; Name; Email; Phone Number

<a id="data-entity-002"></a>
### Bus

ID: `data-entity:002`

- Description: Represents a bus in the Public Transportation Information System.
- Attributes: Bus ID; License Plate; Capacity; Route ID
